cast.name: 阿莱克斯·阿方格 Alex Anfanger

this_title: Eagles Are Turning People Into Horses
introduction: Lyle, sick of his girlfriend's annoying laugh, wants to end their relationship. Too scared to do it honestly, he enacts a scheme to convince her that they must break up because he is at the center of an epic battle between man, beast and fowl. Unfortunately, it all goes according to plan in this epic comedy filled to the brim with twists and turns.
chinese_title: Eagles Are Turning People Into Horses
